longBusinessSummary: VL E-Governance & IT Solutions Limited provides system integration and IT/ITES services for various e-Governance projects in India. It offers e-governance services, including e digitization and modernization of land records, public distribution systems, and various other government services; IT and IT-enabled services, such as software development, IT infrastructure management, and technology consulting; and B2B and equipment trading activities. The company also provides data security, data management and governance, data integration, data digitalization and modernisation, and data integrity in e-governance projects; last mile delivery services of parcels on behalf of e-commerce entities; and courier booking services on B2B and B2C basis; and digital education platform. In addition, it engages in logistics sector, including bullion and jewellery. The company was formerly known as Vakrangee Logistics Private Limited and changed its name to VL E-Governance & IT Solutions Limited in November 2021. The company was incorporated in 2016 and is based in Mumbai, India.
